role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs remote desktop client software on nearly every platform (Remmina, GNOME Boxes, xrdp)
role_description_full_overview: Remmina is a remote desktop client for POSIX-based computer operating systems. It supports the Remote Desktop Protocol, VNC, NX, XDMCP, SPICE and SSH protocols. GNOME Boxes is an application of the GNOME Desktop Environment, used to access remote or virtual systems. Boxes uses the QEMU, KVM, and libvirt virtualization technologies. GNOME Boxes requires the CPU to support some form of hardware-assisted virtualization.
